title: Pair of 1910 Obaks "150 Series" available - Ort & Stewart - prices lowered again!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Pair of 1910 Obaks "150 Series" available - Ort & Stewart - prices lowered again!!
posts.post_content:
Both have some wrinkling but are nice fillers in a really difficult set to put together.  Backs on both are very clean and damage free.  Asking $45 for the Stewart and $50 for Ort.  Or, I would do $85 delivered for the pair.  Thanks in advance!

***Edited to say I would love to trade more than anything else and am trying to find e98 commons, w560 black/red variations, e90-3 commons and w572s in particular right now....

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=54462&d=1327114328[/IMG]

Prices lowered on both. Thanks guys,
Brian
Prices lowered again...asking $45 for the Stewart and $50 for Ort.  Or, I would do $85 delivered for the pair.  Thanks in advance!
